name: Neorude
overview: The Neorude is the plane ship that transport a group of adventures that explore the land in search of ancient ruins and lost treasures. The player will control three different characters (that can be changed during the play choosing which one the player wants to control): Til, Aria & Rufrain. Til & Rufrain are warriors and Aria is a magician. The gameplay is the classic point and click adventure with rpg battle system. The game features 3 different characters to use and 3d cartoon graphics. Manufacturer's description: Reading RPG players will lead indirectly with a cursor 3 people seek adventure free ship Mel legendary continent. Adopted its own system value can be obtained by experience to unravel the mystery, to change the ending of the story by developing a variety of. Let us solve the mystery hidden in the maze to induce a good three tail warrior, witch Aria, roof rain thief. Features: Third person perspective. 3D graphics Cartoon graphics SCI-Fi & Medieval Fantasy themes.
